content: and do your first stitches down one side of the chain and then back up the other side chain 9 round 1 1 double_crochet in 2nd chain from hook half_double_crochet in next 6 chain 3 double_crochet in first chain you made now do the other side to match 6 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet on end round 2 2 double_crochet in next 2 st 1 double_crochet in next 6 st 2 double_crochet in next 2 st 1 double_crochet in next 6 st 2 double_crochet in next 2 st 1 double_crochet on end round 3 2 double_crochet in next 2 st 1 double_crochet in next 7 st 2 double_crochet in next 4 st 1 double_crochet in next 7 st 2 double_crochet in next 2 st 1 double_crochet in next 2 st round 4 1 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 10 st 2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 4 st 2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 10 st 2 double_crochet in next 1 st 1 double_crochet in next 3 st round 5 double_crochet all around 36 round 6 half_double_crochet all around round 7 half_double_crochet all around finishing with a double_crochet do not break yarn but continue to stalk and leaf chain 14 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and slip_stitch back 6 chain this will be baby leaf now chain 4 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and slip_stitch back down the stalk past the stalk of baby leaf you will do one slip_stitch into the end of this stalk carry on doing slip_stitch down to the main leaf and attach back to main leaf with a double_crochet do not break yarn but continue to picot edge * chain 4 slip_stitch in 4th chain from hook miss one st and double_crochet into next st repeat from * until you get back to the stalk slip_stitch into double_crochet at bottom of stalk break yarn and weave in end small leaf rejoin the yarn to the branch to make a small leaf join at the bottom of the baby leaf stalk next to the main stalk go up one side as follows 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 2 treble_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet 3ch 1dc in end chain then back down other side 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 2 treble_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet finish with a slip_stitch cut yarn and sew in ends if you weave the ends down the stalk it will strengthen it a bit blanket using a 3 5 mm hook and any colour yarn multi coloured looks good chain 12 row 1 treble_crochet in 4th chain from hook and then treble_crochet in each chain to end turn 10 row 2 - 6 chain 3 miss st at bottom of chain 1 treble_crochet in next 8 st 1 treble_crochet in top of chain 10 fasten_off yarn leaving a long enough end to use to sew back a small fold at the top of the blanket weave in ends tuck up your little
